reviewText: All 3 of these movies are awesome. They are fiction but, these are situations that happen all the time. You hear about them and you see them on the news. I love these movies. Thank you

i'm watching the Baby Boy movie. I love this movie! But, I rated this with three stars because of the pauses during the good part. I rewind it back but it kept skipping parts. I did scene selection and it still paused or skipped over. It's not my DVD player that's for sure.

Great combination of some classic m movies. I will watch these movies over and over. Story lines well written..
Baby boy a young man who fears dying young let those fears affect him becoming a man and the relationships of those around him while trying to avoid being a statistic of street life.
Boyz-n-da-Hood
Young man growing up in south central is not easy like it is for these 3 friends one is in and out the system, his brother a father and highschool football star, and their neighbor being raised and guided by his father to rise above the drugs, money, violence of city life.
Poetic Justice
Two star crossed lovers who want more from life than what they have received and see everyday in a trip of sadness, happiness, and grief brings these two opposites closer than they could ever imagine.

Good for older people and gives an insight to gang life in USA.
We really enjoyed watching all three movies.
Three great movies for a fantastic deal. I was only looking for the movie Boyz N the Hood, but when I saw I could get all three on DVD for the same price, I jumped on it. Thanks!
